subtitle: Did you know every time you fall to sleep you undergo an out-of-body experience known
as astral projection? In this phenomenal occurrence, your spiritual soul or higher
self SAFELY disengages from your physical body unto the spiritual realm. The spiritual realm
is regarded as the realm where your soul wanders during your dream state while your body is at rest
during sleep or transcendental meditation. As you leave your physical body behind,
you will have the incredible ability to astral fly through all of existence. Once mastered correctly,
you will eventually explore beautiful worlds that stretch to the extent of the universe, spend time
with lost loved ones and ultimately meet and speak with your doppelganger which is another
you in another dimension. Astral projection might allow you
to transcend the constraints of time, letting you visit historical events, ancient civilizations,
or even glimpse into the the future and take a walk through the end of time. During astral
projection, many people report meeting wise and higher dimensional benevolent entities
that guide them through the astral plane and warn them of the demonic lower dimensional spirits.
It's crucial to acknowledge that throughout your time and mastery of the astral plane,
you may encounter the formidable celestial beings known as the formidable Hounds, guardians of the
barriers of the universe and void. These beings, capable of trapping your soul in a soul prison,
should be avoided at all costs, as capture could result in an eternal slumber of your
physical body on earth also known as a coma. These Hounds are believed to safeguard the void
realm where time and nothingness prevail, housing the mother essence of all existence. Tragically,
she is ensnared by her malevolent offspring, the archons, forever separated from our universe.
The astral plane is said to be populated with various entities, from angels and ascended masters
to mythical creatures. Interacting with these beings can be both awe-inspiring and enlightening,
providing you with new perspectives on existence. Some practitioners claim that during astral
projection, they can access the Akashic Records, a cosmic library containing information about every
soul, event, and experience throughout time. Exploring these records could unlock profound
insights into your own life and the universe. Some practitioners claim to have shared astral
experiences with others, allowing them to explore the astral plane together. This shared journey
can deepen connections between individuals on a spiritual levell/ Advanced astral projectors
speak of reaching higher vibrational planes, where they experience states of pure bliss,
unity, and oneness with the universe. These transcendent experiences can be
deeply profound and life-changing. Here the Four Easy Steps for Astral
Projection including Methods and Tips From Thoth The Atlantean Priest King of Ancient Khem & Egypt.
Before step 1 you must be open to the essence of life, expanding your awareness beyond the
shadows and connecting with everything in the universe. Begin by being still,
free from desires and the urge to speak. Break the chains of words with the power of silence.
Overcome the longing for food, as it binds the soul. In darkness, close your eyes and focus your
inner energy on the place you wish to visualize. Use your power to shake off the constraints
of the night until your soul is liberated. Step 1 is to Choose the Right Time & Mindset
Choose an appropriate time, such as just before a nap or upon waking up. It's crucial to be in a
state of being half awake and half sleepy or fatigued. The key to success lies in
relaxing both the mind and the body. Thoth mentions it is prominent to
open to the essence of life, expanding your awareness beyond the shadows and connecting
with everything in the universe. Begin by being still, free from desires and the urge to speak.
Step 2 is to Stay Mentally Active Lay on your back in a comfortable position,
relax your entire body and maintain conscious awareness. Think on positive
beautiful thoughts to keep your mind active. As you approach the launch of your spirit,
your thinking becomes progressively challenging but stay focused. Close your eyes and focus your
inner energy on the place you wish to visualize. Be sure you have not eaten and your stomach is
not full for food weighs your spirit down and keeps you tied to your physical body.
Step 3 is to Set Your Intent During the process, declare your
intention to astral project. Keep arms to your side and legs straight and focus on the ceiling
to maintain the process of relaxation. Remember to stay relaxed, as fear can
disrupt the experience abruptly. Step 4 is Explore the Astral Realm
By step 4, Your soul will begin the vibrational process of leaving your body after 15-20 minutes
of prior steps. You will feel a slight pull or tug near your chest and your soul
will start moving out of your body. Once you're aware of your astral
projection spirit, focus on a specific positive direction or destination you would like to go.
From there Enjoy the vivid and intense surroundings and keep in mind, you can
go back to your physical body at anytime since your silver cord is still attached to your body.
In a profound discourse found within a 36,000-year-old Egyptian text, Thoth The
Atlantean Priest King, who is an Annunaki extraterrestrial, explores hidden knowledge
on astral projection and his soul threatening encounter with the non living guardians of the
barrier and void in the Emerald Tablets. In tablet 6, second verse READS.
Far have I been on my journey though Space-Time, even to the end of the space
of this cycle. Found I there the great barrier, holding man from leaving this cycle. Aye,
glimpsed the Hounds of the Barrier, laying in wait for he who would pass them. In that space where
time exists not, faintly I sensed the guardians of cycles. Move they only through angles. Free
are they not of the curved dimensions. Strange and terrible are the Hounds of the
Barrier. Follow the consciousness to the limits of space. Think not to escape by entering your body,
for follow they fast the Soul through angles. Only the circle will give ye protection,
safe from the claws of the Dweller in Angles. Once, in a time past, I approached the great
Barrier, and saw on the shores where time exists not, the formless forms
of the Hounds of the Barrier. Aye, hiding in the mist beyond time I found them; and They,
scenting me afar off, raised themselves and gave the great bell cry that can be heard from cycle
to cycle and moved through space toward my Soul. Fled I then fast before them, back from time's
unthinkable end. But ever after me pursued they, moving in strange angles not known to man. Aye,
on the gray shore of Time-Space's end found I the Hounds of the Barrier, ravening for the Soul who
attempts the beyond. Fled I through circles back to my body. Fled, and fast after me they
followed. Aye, after me the devourers followed, seeking through angles to devour my Soul.
Aye, know ye man, that the Soul who dares the Barrier may be held in bondage by the Hounds
from beyond time, held till this cycle is all completed and left behind when the consciousness
leaves. Entered I my body. Created the circles that know not angles, created the form that from
my form was formed. Made my body into a circle and lost the pursuers in the circles of time. But,
even yet, when free from my body, cautious ever must I be not to move through angles,
else my Soul might never be free. Know ye, the Hounds of the Barrier move only
through angles and never through curves of space. Only by moving through curves can ye escape them,
for in angles they will pursue thee. O man, heed ye my warning; Seek not to break open the gate
to beyond. Few there are who have succeeded in passing the Barrier to the greater Light that
shines beyond. For know ye, ever the dwellers, seek such Souls to hold in their thrall.
Listen, O man, and heed ye my warning; seek ye to move not in angles but curves. And if while
free from thy body, thou hearest the sound like the bay of a hound ringing clear and
bell-like through thy being, flee back to thy body through circles, penetrate not the mist before.
When thou hast entered the form thou hast dwelt in, use thou the cross and the circle combined.
Open thy mouth and use thou thy Voice. Utter the Word and thou shalt be free. Only the one
who of Light has the fullest can hope to pass by the guards of the way. And then
must he move through strange curves and angles that are formed in direction not known to man.
List ye, O man, and heed ye my warning: attempt not to pass the guards in the way. Rather should
ye seek to gain of thine own Light and make thyself ready to pass on the way.
Light is thine ultimate end, O my brother. Seek and find ever the Light on thy way.
Thoth recounts his profound astral journey, delving into the deepest realms until he
confronted a dimensional barrier leading to the highest planes and dimensions. Ingeniously, Thoth
describes his escape from the pursuing hounds by navigating in circles, and declaring your eternal
light and connection to the creator of all. Our ultimate objective is to attain a meditative
state wherein astral projection becomes a natural and seamless process during sleep
or transcendental meditation, connecting us to our higher self rather than the ego. We encourage
individuals on this transformative journey to fully embrace the learning experience it offers,
provided they are mentally ready and stable. Astral projection, an ancient spiritual practice,
on both astral projection through transcendental meditation or sleep
the consciousness dances on the precipice of reality, and one's sense of higher self,
the true self and real you expands exponentially. These experiences offer glimpses into the
potential of human consciousness. The power of intention, focused thought, and the exploration
of these deep states of consciousness become the key to unlocking the hidden mysteries of
our reality and connection to the creator of all. We trust that this step-by-step guide for astral
projection will prove beneficial on your quest for enlightenment.
The guide encompasses essential practices such as setting clear intentions, conducting reality
checks, waking up during the night, and employing mantras. The key elements for success in this
endeavor are patience and consistency, as each attempt signifies progress along the path. We
also recommend reading Mari' Silver's Astral Projection books for ethereal information on
the astral plane and Billy Carson's Compendium of The Emerald Tablets for more knowledge on
Thoth The ancient extraterrestrial. If you like this video, please like
share and subscribe to Astral Legends, for more unveiling of ancient myths and
legends. May the eternal Light forever guide your path. See you on the next episode.
